Class AstartePairingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.astarteplatform.devicesdk.AstartePairingService

  • public final class AstartePairingService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class responsible for communicating with Astarte Pairing API.

    • Method Detail

      • registerDevice

        public java.lang.String registerDevice(java.lang.String jwtToken,
                                       java.lang.String deviceId)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       AstartePairingException
        Register a device, obtaining its credentials secret.
        Parameters:
        jwtToken - the token to access the agent API
        deviceId - the identify of device
        Returns:
        the credentials secret
        Throws:
        AstartePairingServiceException - if the initialization of the request has not been successful
        java.io.IOException - if the execution of request has not been successful
        AstartePairingException - if the response has not been successful
